name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：
1. 解聯立方程式
2. 矩陣運算
3. 行列式
4. 向量空間
5. 線性轉換
6. 特徵值及特徵向量
7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
schedule:
Week 1: Matrix algebra
Week 2: Peace Memorial Day
Week 3: Linear equations in linear algebra
Week 4: Systems of linear equations
Week 5: Vector equations
Week 6: Determinants
Week 7: Volume and linear transformations
Week 8: Vector spaces ( Null and column spaces )
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10: Linear transformations and independent sets
Week 11: Coordinate systems
Week 12: Eigenvalues
Week 13: Eigenvectors
Week 14: Orthogonality
Week 15: Symmetric matrices
Week 16: Geometry of vector spaces
Week 17: Dragon Boat Festival
Week 18: Final exam
materials: Linear Algebra and its Applications (Fifth Edition) by David C. Lay, Stephen R. Lay, Judi J. McDonald
